content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest command, I used the "browse_website" command to search for reviews of Qalam wa Lawh language school on the website https://www.foodprotection.org/a/partners/link/?id=98&url=//aceachabemun.gq/b7CyRfoodp7, but the website did not provide any information on the topic. The command returned: "The question cannot be answered using the text." In response, I received another "google" command to search for the same reviews.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.goabroad.com/providers/qalam-center-for-arabic-studies", "https://www.qalamcenter.com/study-abroad", "https://www.gooverseas.com/study-abroad/morocco/program/223337", "https://www.qalamcenter.com/study-arabic", "https://themaydan.com/2019/12/summer-language-programs/", "https://news.illinois.edu/view/6367/355382", "https://studyabroad.yale.edu/programs/yale-summer-session-rabat-intermediate-modern", "https://www.linkedin.com/in/lauren-wheeler-kenyon"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.qalamcenter.com/study-abroad", "question": "What are the reviews of Qalam wa Lawh language school on this website?"}}}'}]
"""
